chart_description: The Users Disk Reads chart shows the rate at which data is read from the disk by user processes. It helps identify if high disk reads are affecting system performance.

dimension_descriptions.1001: This dimension represents the disk device being used by the user process.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: This dimension represents the user running the process, identified by their username.
dimension_descriptions.root: This dimension represents the folder or directory in which the user process is reading data from.
